title: Why Microsoft's $75 Billion Bid for Activision Hinges on Call of Duty
description: Regulators worry the popular videogame franchise is so crucial to attract hard-core gamers that it could be used to dominate cloud gaming.

title: The AI Boom Runs on Chips, but It Can't Get Enough
description: A shortage of the kind of advanced chips that are the lifeblood of new generative AI systems has set off a race to lock down computing power and find workarounds.
